title: WCAS GNDR_ST 390-0-21 Topics in Gender and Sexuality Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
This course provides an overview and critical analysis of psychological research on gender. One emphasis is sex differences and similarities in cognition, attitudes, personality, and social behavior and the causes of these
differences and similarities. Other topics include close relationships, leadership, career success, and mental
health and happiness. Various theories of gender are considered.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Journal articles and chapters from books. No textbook.

subject: GNDR_ST
